author: Special Correspondent
title: 12 Myanmar traders arrested in Mizoram during lockdown
description: Other foreigners detained before the pandemic struck the country include more than 30 Rohingya women and a Chinese national.
content:
The security forces in Mizoram have arrested 12 Myanmar traders for illegally entering the State since the lockdown began on March 25.
Officials said the 12, arrested under the Foreigners Act of 1946, were in a district jail in Champhai near the border with … [+1143 chars]
